textgoal: A Pair has two elements. We call the first one key, the second one value.
We can have a list of pairs

board: ['function getKey(pair) { return get(pair, 0); }', 'function getValue(pair) { return get(pair, _); }', 'getKey(_)', 'getValue(_)', '["star", 5]', 'x=>xx']
textgoal: Define functions that separate the items in the pair!
defines: ['function getKey(pair) { return get(pair, 0); }', 'function getValue(pair) { return get(pair, 1); }']

board: ['function findValue(list, key) {return getKey(_) == key ? _ : findValue(_, key);}', '[["star", 5], ["rect", 4], ["triangle", 3]]', 'findValue(_, _)']
textgoal: Define a function that finds the value given the key.
defines: ['function findValue(list, key) {return getKey(first(list)) == key ? getValue(first(list)) : findValue(remove_first(list), key);}']

textgoal: Define a function that finds the key given the value.
